chemical_code.help.csid: Start a game based on ChemSpider ID.
chemical_code.message: Please answer the chemical formula of this compound within ${times} minutes. (Alphabetical order except C, H. e.g. CHBrClF)
chemical_code.message.captcha: Please answer the chemical formula of this compound. (Alphabetical order except C, H. e.g. CHBrClF)
chemical_code.message.csid.invalid: Invalid ID. ID must be a number.
chemical_code.message.error: An error occurred: Failed to start, maybe caused by request database timed out or the ID is invalid. Please re-execute the command or check the input.
chemical_code.message.incorrect.remind2: Hint: The number of ${elements} may be incorrect. Please check again.
chemical_code.message.incorrect.remind3: Hint: It's Almost there! Please try again.
chemical_code.message.incorrect.remind4: Hint: There may be elements missing. Please check again.
chemical_code.message.incorrect.remind5: Hint: The elements are in incorrect order. Please check again.
